TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. But why would you want a non-existing sword?

I wish I could play KSP with all popular mods, without setting down framerates and texture quality

Granted. You can play KSP with mods. Woo hoo.

I wish I had a roll of Duct Tape.

Granted, You're so happy you got it you tape your friend to the wall. He's not your friend anymore.

I wish for a Ferrari.

Granted, but ferraris suck, so ti breaks down, like ALL the others have and will

I wish I had a rocket.

Granted. It is lodged in your intestines, and about to fire.

I wish dubstep wasn't so derned catchy.

Granted; it's not. It never was. You are living a lie.

I wish I had some chocolate...

It contains maggots

I wish people stopped screaming at me on facepunch

Granted, instead, they came to your house slapped you.

I wish I get straight A's on my report card.

Granted. They straightened out the A's into lines, so it looks like you were exempted from getting grades at all when you just see dashes in your grade slots. Because you apparently got no grades, you don't graduate, never find a job, and die penniless.

I wish for burning paper.

Granted. Your desk catches fire and burns your house down.

I wish for Kerbal plushies.

Granted, they launch an assault on Merritt Island and commandeer Cape Canaveral/JFK Space Centre.

I wish to be King of The Hill.

Granted. You now sell propane and propane accessories.

I wish everyone got that joke.

Granted, it's no longer funny and becomes useless.

I wish for a portal gun (anyone guess how I want it corrupted?)

Granted. Glados forces you to shoot it at the mun, and then a second portal at your feet. You die in space, lonely and without air or friends.

I wish I can win the spore contest I am entered in

Granted, you and someone else's names get mixed up, and the other guy ends up the winner.

I wish I could play video games UNINTERRUPTED.

Granted. You can only play E.T. for the Atari.

I wish I was kewl.

Granted, but because the wish-granter has no idea who or what kewl is, it is simply your name that is changed to Kewl.

I wish I could understand what kewl means.

Granted. It's 42.

I wish to abandon my current forme and change into another one.

Granted. You are now a Slug.

I wish I could fly.

Granted. You can't control where you fly, and get sucked into a jet turbine.

I wish I was playing KSP right now.

granted (so do i)

i wish for a supercomputer.

Granted. Your shipment of a superman-themed low-specs computer is now on its way.

I wished to revert back to my human forme.

Granted. But there is a minor unspecified error and you end up as the opposite gender while the machine is badly damaged from the string of malfunctions and cannot change you back.

I wish I had a tank of helium.

Granted, but it happens to be an accidental replacement of your oxygen tank on a diving expedition. You do not notice the error until you are deep underwater, and the first air tank is already empty. Play with the fishes until Death has time for you.

I wish I had a scythe.

Granted. But it is a priceless artifact well over 250 years old. The blade is rusted and the handle rotten, if you try to lift it any higher than necessary to harvest wheat it will break and the falling blade will take a huge chunk out of your leg.

I wish people used their scythes correctly- for harvesting crops.
